DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , randomise , placebo-controlled trial 63 adult age 18 45 year body mass index ( BMI ) 25 kg/m2 high normal kidney function American University Beirut . Participants randomly assign placebo phosphorus group daily placebo phosphorus supplement ingest three main meal ( breakfast , lunch , dinner ) period 12 week . Primary outcome change anthropometric measure , blood metabolite ( include lipid profile , glucose , insulin ) , subjective appetite score .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 CR > 1mg/dl woman ; Cr > 1.2 mg/dl men GFR > 60ml/min/1.73m2 BMI < 25 presence significant medical disease , pregnancy lactation , regular administration drug affect body weight , weight loss 3 % within 3 month study entry .
